title: ZK I Zettel 1,6f1A1 - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body: 1,6f1A1 Contradictory goals must be pursued at the sametime â€“ by different agencies or even, sometimes,within a single agency. These administrativeinconsistencies are simply reflections of theinconsistencies and conflict of values in ourcomplex pluralistic society". Entscheidungsharmonie entspricht, ebenso wie die strukturelleAufbaueinheit, dem Einheitstypus System; vgl. 8,10.
